title.en: I'll Satisfy You, Juliet! – The Beastly Boss and a Tale of Love Too Tall!

altTitles.ja: 満たしてあげよう、ジュリエット～ケダモノ社長のおっきすぎる愛

description.en: "Let me hear it all... Those cute moans of yours!" All my life I’ve never heard such sweet words, nor have my sensitive spots been played with like this before...It feels incredible! Called "Romeo" by her coworkers due to her height, Megumi Narahara has always been self-conscious about how tall she is.But Mr. Kazaoka, the boss of a new client company that she starts working with, treats her like a young girl, and for the first time in her life she can’t stop her pulse from racing!One day, Kazaoka injures himself after saving her from a fall, and Megumi ends up at a hotel looking after him, where he tells her... "You're so cute." The words I've always longed to hear echo through my mind, and when he fills the soaking wet gap between my legs, I can feel myself coming!! The pure-hearted love story between a tall woman and her beastly boss begins here!
